css:
<style>
  .gps-container {
    max-width: 400px;
    margin: 80px 25%;
    padding: 20px;
    text-align: center;
    border: 1px solid #ddd;
    border-radius: 12px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  }

  #send-location {
    padding: 10px 20px;
    background-color: #007cf0;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 6px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 16px;
  }

  #send-location:hover {
    background-color: #005bb5;
  }

  #status {
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    font-size: 14px;
    color: #444;
  }
</style>
